tasks.start: deno task build:gweb && deno task build:run
tasks.start-static: deno task build:gweb && deno task build:run-static
tasks.build:gweb: "c:/Program Files/National Instruments/G Web Development Software/gwebcli.exe" build-application -p ../Deno.gwebproject -t "Default Web Server" -n WebApp.gcomp
